page.title: 19Old People. Clubs.
page.content:
Old People. The old people are well cared for in Longwick. There is a small close of bungalows for them owned by the local authority, and a private home has taken over the old school. A thriving over 60's club meets in the village hall and also organizes outings. Clubs. Clubs existing in Longwick include the Housewives Register, W.I., Keep Fit, Mothers and Toddlers.
Longwick Sports Club. Since l972 when the new playing field was opened, Longwick has been able to run both cricket and football teams. Fund raising activities, a garden fete, the harvest festival in the White Horse, an annual dinner and dance help support them and are much enjoyed by the village. It is hoped to floodlight the field in winter soon.
